abstract: Mexican officials report that fire killed 16 residents of a nursing home on the outskirts of Mexicali, the capital of Baja California.
lead_paragraph: A fire Tuesday killed 16 residents of a nursing home on the outskirts of Mexicali, the capital of Baja California, officials said.

headline.main: Mexico: Deadly Fire Hits Nursing Home
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Deadly Fire Hits Nursing Home

snippet: A fire Tuesday killed 16 residents of a nursing home on the outskirts of Mexicali, the capital of Baja California, officials said.
